description:
We currently have an opening for a " Digital Marketing Analytics" position in Montreal, Quebec, Canada. Below, you'll find the detailed job description. This role offers full-time employment with the flexibility of 100% remote work. However, candidates must be situated within Canadian borders.

Must have: The candidates must be fluent in the French language.

Required skills:
Excellent command of French and English, oral and written.
Good experience in analytics implementation, particularly with Adobe Analytics or Google Analytics.
Accountable for the deployment of tags to production.
Familiarity with Tag Management Systems, preferably Google Tag Manager (GTM), Dynamic Tag Manager (DTM).
Knowledge of deploying pixels and other MarTech tools.
